ValidationRule.description: Only System Admin and Sales Admin can Edit these fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Sales Admin Profile'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator') ) ), OR( ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(ParentId), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(Type) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: User access level does not allow to edit Account Name,Parent Account, Type, Address and Account Owner.
